Text: Thanks for a great upload. But please, next time use PDF, not Djvu. Most ebook readers can't use djvu...
Not a .pdf? Oww...it sure is great book ivap38, though.

DJVU rocks. A 20 MB PDF is compressed to a 5 MB djvu. 

Uploader you rock \m/
Thanks a tonne for sharing, you made my life easier.
I'm definitely not a fan of DJVU
